body: wtf is the guy below the guy below me saying
@bird I dont need to be told this from someone that sucks toes

I shalt issue a warning: DOTH NOT ENGAGE IN SEXUAL ENCOUNTERS WITH DOGS, MUCH LESS INJECTETH THINE LOVE JUICE INTO THEM. Thou would thinketh that this shouldst go without saying, but some of the UnHoly gobshites I've conversed with truly believe that sticking thine Wande of Mightie Girthe into an animal is acceptable. 

But do not fret, I come not to kinkshame. Thou are allowed to slap thine Totemme Pole around to whatever thou wouldst like, just doth not repeat these actions towards actual townsfolk and barnyard animals.
